title: Dias Angga Putra
text:
Dias Angga Putra (born 6 May 1989) is an Indonesian professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>er who plays as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29%23Full-back">full-back</a> for <a href="Liga%201%20%28Indonesia%29">Liga 1</a> club <a href="Bali%20United%20F.C.">Bali United</a>.
Personal life.
In November 2014, Dias got married. His mother is from <a href="Ternate">Ternate</a>, <a href="Maluku%20%28province%29">Maluku</a>.
Club career.
He signed a two-year contract with <a href="Pelita%20Bandung%20Raya">Pelita Bandung Raya</a> on 26 November 2013. In November 2014, he signed again with <a href="Persib%20Bandung">Persib Bandung</a>.
